customer.review: I personally have not used these footbags but I did buy the Marely and Hathor for my sons. They start getting into this Hackysack thing about a year ago and we were going footbag after footbag. The great thing about knockOUT's footbags is they are extremely durable. My kids have yet to tear them apart. I was also super pleased with the shipping time. Arrived on time and in great condition! I am extermely satisified with my experience

I've only bought from this place once and got the knit cloth Joey-D. I was fairly satisified with it. Took awhile to get to me after I order it. Like a week and half. However this guy can take a beating. I've dropped and slammed him on the ground at least 1000 times and the sucker is still in one piece. Guess the knit cloth is pretty durable.

I was pretty satisfied with my experience with knockOUT. I've been playing this game for about year now and I have found I can achieve much more stability with Knight Wing than most of footbags I have used. The sand fill really does help me out with trick moves like balancing poses. I was also pretty satisified with delivery service. These guys know how to show up on time.

I have bought several footbags from knockOUT. They never let me me down. I own Nova New, Slacker and I just recently got The Twins! Usually I am cheapskate, but since I've enjoy Nova and Slacker so much I dedcided to spring for someething more pricey. TOTALLY worth it! I've never had footbags last as long as the ones I bought from knockOUT. I've been the hacking for years and I am not one to go easy. I typically go through one footbag a week. Not the case with knockout.

Absolutely, hands down, sickest hacky sack I own. The handle on the Hummingbird is just flawless. I can not get balance like this with any of my other hacky sacks. I would certainly recommend this bag to other players!
